name: Bowling's Boy
description:
In this brand new unreleased retro game, play the role of the boy behind the scenes who arranges the fallen pins of the bowling tracks.
Be careful not to be hit by the knocked down pins and, in Game B, also pay attention to arrange the pins in time, before the ball reaches the bottom of the track!
Challenge your friends to beat your records.
The incredible experience of diving back in the 80s while having fun with the exciting portable LCD game consoles. Graphics, sounds, visual effects are faithfully reproduced and designed to let you totally immerse yourself in the game.
Try the easy Game A and the harder Game B.
Collect all Back to the 80s Games !!!
